If.Code: Bots.Professionbuddy.PBLog.Log(Colors.MediumPurple, "[Profile Message!]: ", Colors.Yellow, "Please stand by as the functions are being activated!");

Code.TerminateWhen: Unit(93686, u => u.IsDead) != null || Unit(93677, u => u.QuestGiverStatus == QuestGiverStatus.TurnIn || u.QuestGiverStatus == QuestGiverStatus.Available) != null

Code.UseWhen: ObjectManager.GetObjectsOfType<WoWGameObject>().FirstOrDefault(x => x.SubType == WoWGameObjectType.Door && x.Distance < 5 && x.State == WoWGameObjectState.Ready) != null
ObjectManager.GetObjectsOfType<WoWGameObject>().FirstOrDefault(x => x.SubType == WoWGameObjectType.Door && x.Distance < 5 && x.State == WoWGameObjectState.Ready) != null
